summary: This is an email from October 10, 2020, regarding a draft list of search terms to be run through electronic devices on the Relativity platform in relation to the Epstein case. The email includes attachments of a search warrant and a document containing the search terms, and solicits feedback on the draft list.

persons.name: EFTA00101064
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email, likely a law enforcement agent or legal professional involved in the Epstein investigation, sharing a draft list of search terms for electronic devices.

keyFacts: A draft list of search terms was being prepared for running through electronic devices on the Relativity platform in October 2020.
The search was related to the Epstein case, as indicated by the reference to the attached search warrant.
The email solicited feedback on the draft search terms, indicating a collaborative review process among investigators or legal team members.
